pullRequest.title: Update BallerinaProjectService
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Update BallerinaProjectService with new project APIs.
Fixes https://github.com/ballerina-platform/plugin-vscode/issues/99
Approach

Describe how you are implementing the solutions along with the design details.

Samples

Provide high-level details about the samples related to this feature.

Remarks

List any other known issues, related PRs, TODO items, or any other notes related to the PR.

Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

nodes.bodyText: Shall we use the PROJ_MODULES("ballerinaProject/modules")? Because even in the new project structure, modules are the components we need to show in the project view.

Instead of using the visitor to capture the symbols, what's the possibility of using https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/blob/master/compiler/ballerina-lang/src/main/java/io/ballerina/compiler/api/SemanticModel.java#L60 API?
